this 1935 error is a bitch. after some diggin' it happens to other application installs as well. without trying to figure out which service or program that is running in the background that is causing this here is what did it for me. start - run - msconfig, disable all startup programs, then go to the services tab and check "hide all MS Services" then disable the rest of the crap. this did it fo me! good luck.
